It was a pionner in developing software in Portugal, being the first company to release a commercial videogame in Portugal [http://www.mobygames.com/game/windows/portugal-1111], [[Portugal 1111: A Conquista de Soure]], the first game completly produced and designed in Portugal.
+
A pionner in developing software in Portugal, was the first company to release a commercial videogame in Portugal [http://www.mobygames.com/game/windows/portugal-1111], [[Portugal 1111: A Conquista de Soure]], the first game completly produced and designed in Portugal. <br>
  +
Ciberbit also worked in partnership with [[Microsoft TV]] to create multiplayer games for future TV devices. [http://www.microsoft.com/tv/content/Press/PressReleases/MSTVIndustrySupportPR.mspx]
